entry.title: [APAC Regions][Public Network] - Backbone incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 30, 00:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 29/07/2022 20:35 UTC
End Time : 30/07/2022 00:35 UTC
Service impact : All links are up, no more disruption.
Root cause : The maintenance from our provider is done.

Jul 29, 23:53 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/07/2022 20:35 UTC
Service impact : We are still have some latency regarding network on APAC region.
Root cause : Incident caused by a maintenance in progress from our partner.
Ongoing actions : A fix is in progress to restore the service.

Jul 29, 20:58 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 29/07/2022 20:35 UTC
Service impact : We are currently experiencing issues regarding network on APAC region
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the cause of this issue and the service up again.
